dmca.title: NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Anjali [mailto:anjalikara@adoreanjali.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 04, 2005 9:50 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT


NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT

Complainant Name : Anjali Kara
Address : PO BOX 37915
city: London 
Country: United Kingdom
Phone : +44 (0)115 8461558

This notice is served on:

http://www.desitorrents.com

Date: April 4th 2005

This copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following
URL's and/or the infringing activity is found at the following URL's:
 
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=38008
All content is owned by myeself as the operator of www.adoreanjali.com
 
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=21068
All content is owned by myeself as the operator of www.adoreanjali.com
 
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=27169
All content is owned by myeself as the operator of www.adoreanjali.com
 
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=22530
All content is owned by myeself as the operator of www.adoreanjali.com
 
 
I request that the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access
to it disabled:

I have contacted the moderator/operator of this site several times and have
had no reply. I have also tried to contact other listed moderators to get my
content removed from the site with no joy. Since this cannot be solved
amicably, they have left me in option but to email yourselves as you are
listed as the hosting company for desitorrents.com
 
This guy hides behind whoisguard and believes he can run an illegal site by
hiding behind a tenuous dislcaimer:
 
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/disclaimer.php
 
I also believe he is breaking your AUP by running Bit Torrent. His site is
rife with copyrighted material and is blatently breaking the law. He makes
no action to moderate his board.
 


THIS NOTICE IS PER THE DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT of 1998

As the owner of the exclusive right to the copyrighted material at issue in
this notice, I hereby state that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the
law. I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States, that the information in this notification is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, that as the complaining party and owner of an exclusive
right that is being infringed as set out in this notification 


Anjali Kara
